transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Abdul ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Very good morning. Senior manager baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Thoda main gaon se bahar hu sir. Main subah puja mein.
Executive: Sir aapka concern open hai. Aap samajhiye sir, hamara bhi tight count hota hai sir.
Customer: Suniye sir, mere pass time nahi hai, close kar dijiye sir. No business is important for me.
Executive: Okay. Okay. Main aapka ye concern close kar.
Customer: Close kar dijiye. Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Main ise close kara deta hu sir aur jab aap available sir aap.
Customer: You have to wait sir. You have to wait.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ji. Sir aisa hai ki main aap jo
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Main sir ye keh raha hu ki main aapka concern close karta hu aur jab bhi aap available ho aaj kal ya any day aap sir.
Customer: Text kiya hu na puja madam ko. Once when I am back I'll call you. Okay.
Executive: Okay, to jo aapka ticket hai sir main wo close kar raha hu sir. Right. Kyunki sir ticket to utna long time tak nahi chal payega sir. Right.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Okay okay sure sir. So I will close.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to close the open concern.

Resolution:

- Executive agreed to close the concern ticket.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- concern, ticket, close
